import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { useCart } from '../../contexts/CartContext'; import AuthModal from '../auth/AuthModal'; import CartSidebar from '../cart/CartSidebar'; const Header = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { user, logout, isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const { getTotalItems, isCartOpen, closeCart, toggleCart } = useCart(); const [isAuthModalOpen, setIsAuthModalOpen] = useState(false); const [authMode, setAuthMode] = useState('login'); const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const handleAuthClick = (mode) => { setAuthMode(mode); setIsAuthModalOpen(true); }; const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (searchQuery.trim()) { navigate(`/services?search=${encodeURIComponent(searchQuery.trim())}`); setSearchQuery(''); } }; const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/'); }; return ( <>
{/* Logo */}
HomeEase
{/* Search Bar - Hidden on mobile and for providers/admins */} {user?.userType !== 'provider' && user?.userType !== 'admin' && (
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} placeholder="Search for services..." className="w-full pl-12 pr-4 py-3 border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-full focus:border-primary-500 focus:outline-none transition-colors bg-gray-50 focus:bg-white" />
)} {/* Navigation - Hidden on mobile */}
{user?.userType === 'admin' ? ( // Admin Navigation <> Dashboard Pending Providers Users Services ) : user?.userType === 'provider' ? ( // Provider Navigation <> Dashboard My Bookings My Services Reviews ) : ( // Customer Navigation <> Home Services My Bookings About Us Contact )}
{/* Right side buttons */}
{/* Cart button - Hidden for providers and admins */} {user?.userType !== 'provider' && user?.userType !== 'admin' && ( )} {/* Auth buttons */} {isAuthenticated ? (
{/* Dropdown menu */}
{user?.userType === 'admin' ? ( // Admin dropdown menu <> Admin Dashboard Pending Providers Manage Users Profile ) : user?.userType === 'provider' ? ( // Provider dropdown menu <> Dashboard Manage Services Profile ) : ( // Customer dropdown menu <> Profile My Bookings )}
) : (
)} {/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Mobile search bar - Hidden for providers and admins */} {user?.userType !== 'provider' && user?.userType !== 'admin' && (
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} placeholder="Search for services..." className="w-full pl-12 pr-4 py-3 border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-full focus:border-primary-500 focus:outline-none transition-colors bg-gray-50 focus:bg-white" />
)}
{/* Mobile menu */} {isMobileMenuOpen && (
{user?.userType === 'admin' ? ( // Admin Mobile Navigation <> setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Admin Dashboard setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Pending Providers setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Manage Users setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Manage Services {isAuthenticated && ( setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Profile )} ) : user?.userType === 'provider' ? ( // Provider Mobile Navigation <> setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Dashboard setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > My Bookings setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > My Services setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Reviews {isAuthenticated && ( setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Profile )} ) : ( // Customer Mobile Navigation <> setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Home setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Services {isAuthenticated && ( setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > My Bookings )} setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > About Us setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Contact {isAuthenticated && ( <> setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Profile setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > My Bookings )} )} {!isAuthenticated && (
)}
)}
{/* Auth Modal */} setIsAuthModalOpen(false)} mode={authMode} onSwitchMode={setAuthMode} /> {/* Cart Sidebar - Hidden for providers */} {user?.userType !== 'provider' && ( )} ); }; export default Header;
